name: CreateBackup
description:
Initiates backup creation for specified collections.

This tool starts the process of creating a backup for the specified collections on a designated backend storage using Weaviate. The backup is compressed using gzip by default, and the system remains operational during the backup process. Use this tool when you need to ensure data is safely backed up without interrupting service.

parameters.name: backend_storage_system
parameters.description: Specifies the backend storage system where the backup will be stored, such as `filesystem`, `gcs`, `s3`, or `azure`.

value_schema.description: Specifies the backend storage system where the backup will be stored (e.g., `filesystem`, `gcs`, `s3`, `azure`).

parameters.name: backup_id
parameters.description: The ID of the backup. Must be URL-safe, using only lowercase, numbers, underscore, and minus characters.

value_schema.description: The ID of the backup (required). Must be URL-safe and work as a filesystem path, only lowercase, numbers, underscore, minus characters allowed.

parameters.name: storage_endpoint_name
parameters.description: Name of the storage endpoint, such as s3.amazonaws.com, where the backup will be stored.

value_schema.description: Name of the endpoint, e.g. s3.amazonaws.com.

parameters.name: bucket_name
parameters.description: Name of the bucket, container, or volume where the backup will be stored.

value_schema.description: Name of the bucket, container, volume, etc.

parameters.name: bucket_path
parameters.description: Specifies the path or key within the storage bucket. This helps in locating where the backup will be stored within the bucket.

value_schema.description: Path or key within the bucket.

parameters.name: cpu_utilization_percentage
parameters.description: Sets desired CPU core utilization, ranging from 1% to 80%, during backup creation.

value_schema.description: Desired CPU core utilization ranging from 1%-80%

parameters.name: backup_chunk_size
parameters.description: Set the chunk size for the backup with a minimum of 2MB, default of 128MB, and a maximum of 512MB.

value_schema.description: Aimed chunk size, with a minimum of 2MB, default of 128MB, and a maximum of 512MB. The actual chunk size may vary.

parameters.name: compression_level
parameters.description: Specifies the compression level for the backup: DefaultCompression, BestSpeed, or BestCompression.

value_schema.description: compression level used by compression algorithm

parameters.name: collections_to_include_in_backup
parameters.description: List of collections to include in the backup. If not set, all collections are included. Cannot be used with `collections_to_exclude_in_backup`.

value_schema.description: List of collections to include in the backup creation process. If not set, all collections are included. Cannot be used together with `exclude`.

parameters.name: exclude_collections
parameters.description: List of collections to exclude from the backup. Overrides include if both are set.

value_schema.description: List of collections to exclude from the backup creation process. If not set, all collections are included. Cannot be used together with `include`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the weaviate API.

parameters.name: backend
parameters.description: Specifies the backend storage system where the backup will be stored (e.g., `filesystem`, `gcs`, `s3`, `azure`).

value_schema.description: Specifies the backend storage system where the backup will be stored (e.g., `filesystem`, `gcs`, `s3`, `azure`).

parameters.description: The ID of the backup (required). Must be URL-safe and work as a filesystem path, only lowercase, numbers, underscore, minus characters allowed.

value_schema.description: The ID of the backup (required). Must be URL-safe and work as a filesystem path, only lowercase, numbers, underscore, minus characters allowed.

parameters.name: config.Endpoint
parameters.description: Name of the endpoint, e.g. s3.amazonaws.com.

value_schema.description: Name of the endpoint, e.g. s3.amazonaws.com.

parameters.name: config.Bucket
parameters.description: Name of the bucket, container, volume, etc.

value_schema.description: Name of the bucket, container, volume, etc.

parameters.name: config.Path
parameters.description: Path or key within the bucket.

value_schema.description: Path or key within the bucket.

parameters.name: config.CPUPercentage
parameters.description: Desired CPU core utilization ranging from 1%-80%

value_schema.description: Desired CPU core utilization ranging from 1%-80%

parameters.name: config.ChunkSize
parameters.description: Aimed chunk size, with a minimum of 2MB, default of 128MB, and a maximum of 512MB. The actual chunk size may vary.

value_schema.description: Aimed chunk size, with a minimum of 2MB, default of 128MB, and a maximum of 512MB. The actual chunk size may vary.

parameters.name: config.CompressionLevel
parameters.description: compression level used by compression algorithm

value_schema.description: compression level used by compression algorithm

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: List of collections to include in the backup creation process. If not set, all collections are included. Cannot be used together with `exclude`.

value_schema.description: List of collections to include in the backup creation process. If not set, all collections are included. Cannot be used together with `exclude`.

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: List of collections to exclude from the backup creation process. If not set, all collections are included. Cannot be used together with `include`.

value_schema.description: List of collections to exclude from the backup creation process. If not set, all collections are included. Cannot be used together with `include`.
